body:
Hi,


great to know the packages are useful here, too. What I'm wondering
about is if there's anything else out there which is under a DFSG
compatible license and could be included in Debian, too? If somebody
else would like to maintain such packages in Debian just let me know and
I'll happily review and sponsor the uploads for them - or create and
maintain the packages if you want me to.


Cheers,

Bernd

--
Bernd Zeimetz                           Debian GNU/Linux Developer
GPG Fingerprint: 06C8 C9A2 EAAD E37E 5B2C BE93 067A AD04 C93B FF79
subject: [Radiance-general] LEARNIX 2008-1 beta
